about_the_game:
Enter a world where survival becomes a lethal game. where your simple trip to the supermarket turns into a terrifying nightmare when a thick, unfathomable fog engulfs the city, isolating the supermarket as the only safe haven. What seems like a safe haven, however, turns out to be
serves as a deadly prison for those who venture beyond its limits.

In "Amidst the Haze," the normality of an ordinary trip to the grocery store is quickly transformed into a survival nightmare. A dense, ominous fog engulfs the city, confining a group of customers and employees to the supermarket,
the only apparently safe place. However, what lurks outside this sanctuary could be an unknown, lethal threat.

This oppressive fog is not merely atmospheric, but rather a veil that conceals terrifying, nameless entities. Those who venture out of the supermarket face an uncertain fate,
risking their lives before these dark creatures. The fight for survival becomes a battle between staying within the familiar but increasingly claustrophobic walls or risking the unknown outside.


]ATMOSPHERE


Survive inside a supermarket filled with intense and claustrophobic fog, where supernatural beings live.

]OBJECTIVES]


You will need to join the others in the supermarket and find a way to survive the unknown. Seek an answer to everything that is happening,
solve missions and fight for your life.

DURATION


Considerably short game, there are no save points.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains parts with moderate violence, as well as firearms, gore, deaths, among others.
